title: Tutor

achievements: Spoke and taught in front of 20+ students each class
Guided students through practical programming tasks, answered relevant questions

Received outstanding student review and feedback

title: Software Developer
company: Commercial POS & IT Networks / Cache Technologies
achievements: Gathered comprehensive requirements from stakeholders
Designed both the system architecture and the user interface of a Business Intelligence (BI) web application
Developed the BI application, consists of a backend (Spring Boot + Kotlin) and a frontend (Vue + TypeScript)
Wrote complex SQL queries to obtain sales and financial data required by the BI application
The beta-stage BI application received overwhelmingly positive feedback from customers
Wrote GitHub Actions workflows to automatically deploy applications as Docker images, reduced deployment time significantly
Cooperated with the business owner and other colleagues, and trained new employees
Developed side projects for customers, mostly using C# (.NET / Windows Form)
